item.title: Messed up in my client.java
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

Simple Solution: Find the symbols it says they cannot find declared, go up to the top outside of any other methods/operations and declare the variable(s):

public void runForestRun();
public void int stopWatch = 0;

Such as above ^ and that should get the job done. If you still have your hasset problem, declare it as so:

public void hasset = 0;

Hope this helps!!!

Read full topic

client.java:28325: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyHP2 location: class client if ((EnemyHP2 - hitDiff) < 0) { ^ client.java:28326: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyHP2 location: class client hitDiff = EnemyHP2; ^ client.java:28331: cannot find symbol symbol : variable npcIndex location: class client server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff = hitDiff; ^ client.java:28332: cannot find symbol symbol : variable npcIndex location: class client server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].Killing[playerId] += hitDiff; ^ client.java:28333: cannot find symbol symbol : variable npcIndex location: class client server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].updateRequired = true; ^ client.java:28334: cannot find symbol symbol : variable npcIndex location: class client server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitUpdateRequired = true; ^ client.java:28336: break outside switch or loop break; ^ client.java:34206: cannot find symbol symbol : variable hasset location: class client hasset=Integer.parseInt(token2); ^ client.java:34397: cannot find symbol symbol : variable hasset location: class client characterfile.write(Integer.toString(hasset),0, ^ client.java:34398: cannot find symbol symbol : variable hasset location: class client Integer.toString(hasset).length()); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 10 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2009, 12:32:22 pm[/size][hr]the break; thing idk what the problem is, here’s what I have

[code] if ((EnemyHP2 - hitDiff) < 0) {
hitDiff = EnemyHP2;
}

        mageXP = (hitDiff * 4);
        addSkillXP(hitDiff * 1000, 6);
